column2: "Headline: Mysterious floating ruins suddenly appear on the peaceful waters of Vopar!"
"What mystery? It's public knowledge that Luther used them as a research facility."
"But wait!! Our intrepid explorers Patty & Tea are stopped by mysterious new enemies!!"
"Hello? No mystery here. They're all Oceanids that came from inside."
"With their backs against the wall, what will happen to our heroines!?"
"To be continued--!!"
"The END. Greetings, Tea here."
"Gosh, we combed the Coast, and then the Seabed... who'da thunk there's still more here?"
"Even I, the Great Patty, could not predict this turn of events!!"
"The rubble on the beach, the strange buildings undersea, and now these floating ruins. Apparently, all were built by the ancient Photoners."
"Once they were abandoned, Luther converted them into his own private laboratory."
"Say, what were they made for anyway?"
"That's a good question. It seems Luther's use was different than their original purpose."
"Hmm~ Their design is kinda fun, and they're surrounded by calm tides... Oh! I got it!!"
"Hah ha! The Photoners made their own Water Park!"
"Excuse me?"
"Look! Ocean in all directions along with this amazing weather! You gotta be crazy not to enjoy it!"
"That... is an actual possibility. Past records suggest they were somewhat whimsical..."
"Everyone needs to cut loose now and then! ARKS and Photoners alike!"
"So on that note!! Time to go for a dip and soak up the sun...!!"
"Nice try."
